text: @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer Oh, hey.....you should release all the "ADD-ONS" you put on the $8.5 Billion coronavirus bill.  I think the American ppl deserve to know what you gained from that since the president only asked for $2 Billion.  gonna guess you won't reveal that because it would self incriminate
